definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，極樂國土，成就如是功德莊嚴。

sentences.english: A magnificent gleam of triumph sprang into Cowper-wood's eye.
sentences.chinese: 柯帕伍德的眼睛裏突然透露出勝利的莊嚴的光芒來。

sentences.english: Whither go these majestic irradiations of the soul?Into the shadow;
sentences.chinese: 靈魂的那種莊嚴光輝放射到什麼地方去呢？

sentences.english: The solemn statement was featured in full in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 各報全文刊登了這一莊嚴的聲明。

sentences.english: He has always had problems putting into words the grandeur of that moment 40 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他一直不太接受40年前的那一刻是莊嚴壯舉的說法。

sentences.english: After the clang or of organ majestic, or chorus, or perfect band.
sentences.chinese: 當莊嚴的風琴，或者合唱隊，或整個樂團，演奏完了。

sentences.english: The merits, virtues and adornments such as these are inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 如是功德莊嚴，不可思議。

sentences.english: Something of the awfulness, even of Death itself, is referable to this.
sentences.chinese: 莊嚴的一些東西，甚至是死亡本身，都與這有關。

sentences.english: The garden was decorated so majestically that even Yuanchun thought it to be too luxurious.
sentences.chinese: 園林是如此莊嚴，即使裝飾石元春認爲它過於奢華。

sentences.english: Now, the National Guard looks at us with respect and dignity.
sentences.chinese: 現在，國民警衛隊也以尊重和莊嚴的目光看待我們。

sentences.english: The solemn statement of the central government on this issue was featured in full in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 各報全文刊登了中央政府對這個問題的莊嚴聲明。

sentences.english: After that the generals began to disperse with the solemnity and circumspect taciturnity with which people separate after a funeral.
sentences.chinese: 將軍們隨即莊嚴肅穆地退場，像參加完了葬禮一樣。

sentences.english: Facing the solemn duty badge, we will love the job.
sentences.chinese: 面對莊嚴的稅徽，我們要愛崗敬業。

sentences.english: The crane stood grave and still in the swamp near the mango grove.
sentences.chinese: 白鶴莊嚴而安靜地立在芒果樹旁的泥沼中。

sentences.english: He declined the invitation with stately grace.
sentences.chinese: 他莊嚴而文雅地謝絕了邀請。
他曾在莊嚴的人生大海中飄航。

definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha 佛, the Dharma 法 (his teaching), and the Sangha 僧 (his monastic order)
